Phi OPEN:( italic-u PUNCT:, italic-v CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-F OPEN:( italic-u CLOSE:) ADDOP:plus italic-G OPEN:( italic-v CLOSE:) ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-a POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( TRIGFUNCTION:hyperbolic-sine POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-u ADDOP:plus TRIGFUNCTION:sine POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-v CLOSE:) ARG:end PUNCT:,
\Phi(u,v)=\frac{F(u)+G(v)}{2a^{2}(\sinh^{2}u+\sin^{2}v)},

Sigma OPEN:( italic-x POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PUNCT:, italic-y POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:4 italic-pi POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-G ARG:end INTOP:integral INTOP:integral FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start OPEN:( OPERATOR:nabla POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end Phi CLOSE:) italic-d italic-x italic-d italic-y ARG:end ARG:start italic-square-root ARG:start OPEN:( italic-x POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus italic-x CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus OPEN:( italic-y POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus italic-y CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:end PERIOD:.
\Sigma(x^{\prime},y^{\prime})=\frac{1}{4\pi^{2}G}\int\int\frac{(\nabla^{2}\Phi% )dxdy}{\sqrt{(x^{\prime}-x)^{2}+(y^{\prime}-y)^{2}}}.

Phi RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-K italic-s POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-r ARG:end ARG:start italic-s ARG:end CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-r ARG:end ARG:start italic-s ARG:end CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-r ARG:end PERIOD:.
\Phi=\frac{Ks^{\gamma-1}}{2}\frac{(1+\frac{r}{s})^{\gamma}+(1-\frac{r}{s})^{% \gamma}}{r}.

Phi RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-K italic-s POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-r ARG:end OPEN:[ NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n RELOP:equals NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ID:infinity POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start Gamma OPEN:( italic-gamma ADDOP:plus NUMBER:1 CLOSE:) ARG:end ARG:start OPEN:( NUMBER:2 italic-n CLOSE:) POSTFIX:factorial Gamma OPEN:( italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 italic-n ADDOP:plus NUMBER:1 CLOSE:) ARG:end OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-r ARG:end ARG:start italic-s ARG:end CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:] PUNCT:,
\Phi=\frac{Ks^{\gamma-1}}{r}\left[1+\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\frac{\Gamma(\gamma+1)}% {(2n)!\Gamma(\gamma-2n+1)}\left(\frac{r}{s}\right)^{2n}\right],

Phi RELOP:approximately-equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-K OPEN:( NUMBER:2 italic-a CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-r ARG:end PERIOD:.
\Phi\approx\frac{K(2a)^{\gamma-1}}{r}.

Phi RELOP:approximately-equals italic-K NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-r POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
\Phi\approx K2^{\gamma-1}r^{\gamma-2}.
Sigma RELOP:proportional-to italic-r POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:3 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
\Sigma\propto r^{\gamma-3}.

TRIGFUNCTION:hyperbolic-cosine italic-u POSTSUBSCRIPT:start m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:4 italic-a POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-E ARG:end ARG:start italic-C italic-gamma ARG:end CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-gamma ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 ARG:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PUNCT:,
\cosh u_{\rm m}=\left(\frac{4a^{2}E}{C\gamma}\right)^{\frac{1}{\gamma-2}},

italic-f POSTSUBSCRIPT:start m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 italic-a POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-E TRIGFUNCTION:hyperbolic-sine POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-u POSTSUBSCRIPT:start m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-C OPEN:( TRIGFUNCTION:hyperbolic-cosine italic-u POSTSUBSCRIPT:start m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-gamma POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
f_{\rm m}=-2a^{2}E\sinh^{2}u_{\rm m}+C(\cosh u_{\rm m})^{\gamma}.
italic-I POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:greater-than-or-equals italic-f POSTSUBSCRIPT:start m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
I_{2}\geq f_{\rm m}.

f_{\rm m}\leq I_{2}\leq 2a^{2}E.
